revised_title: The Role of Apoptosis in Development, Tissue Homeostasis, and Malignancy
tldr: This preface highlights the growing interest in cell death from inside out and its significance in development, tissue homeostasis, and malignancy. The articles in this volume summarize a discussion meeting held at the Royal Society, featuring contributions from a distinguished international group of researchers. The understanding of this process and its events may lead to new pharmacological agents for cancer treatment.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
